It is not an oversized shirt in the least. It is a regular t shirt and the 2xl fits as an xl basic t shirt. Regular length on sleeves and overall.

Exactly what I wanted for my boyfriend! Nice thick quality t shirt and the print isn’t bad. I don’t think it would peel in the dryer but maybe a low cool cycle would guarantee that it won’t! Overall very stylish.

The Werbavi Vintage Graphic Tee is a fantastic addition to my wardrobe. The oversized fit is comfortable and trendy, and the floral letter print adds a unique, retro vibe. The cotton fabric is soft and breathable, making it perfect for casual wear. The dark gray color is versatile and pairs well with jeans or shorts. I highly recommend this tee for anyone looking for a stylish and comfortable casual top.
This vintage graphic t-shirt has a comfortable and chill vibe to it. It’s loose fitting and soft. Color is as expected. I recommend.
